CustomField.description: This field is automatically populated via trigger. It stores the LLC_BI__Total_Current_Lien_Amount__c value at the time the loan is booked. Prior Lien Amount stores the sum of all liens associated with the loan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: All liens held against the loan except the liens associated to the loan. Populated when the loan hits booked
CustomField.label: Total Prior Lien Amount
